tasks.name: Create favicon.ico file
tasks.description: Create favicon.ico file in src/ directory. Convert from existing favicon.svg or create new ICO file.

instructions.details: Create favicon.ico file. Option 1: Convert favicon.svg to ICO format. Option 2: Create new ICO file with same design. File should be 16x16 or 32x32 pixels. Place in src/ directory.

tasks.name: Test favicon.ico loads without 404
tasks.description: Test that favicon.ico loads correctly in browser without 404 error.

instructions.details: Deploy to Vercel and test favicon.ico loads. Check browser console for 404 errors. Verify favicon displays in browser tab.

tasks.name: Delete export-sales-appliances.html
tasks.description: Remove export-sales-appliances.html file from project root as it duplicates processor portal functionality.

instructions.details: Delete export-sales-appliances.html file from project root. This file is a duplicate of processor portal export functionality and should be removed to avoid confusion and maintain single source of truth.

acceptance_criteria: No references to deleted file in codebase

tasks.name: Verify no references to removed file
tasks.description: Verify no code references export-sales-appliances.html after deletion.

instructions.details: Search entire codebase for references to 'export-sales-appliances.html'. Verify no links, imports, or references exist. Check HTML files, JavaScript files, and documentation.

tasks.name: Test processor portal export button
tasks.description: Test that processor portal export button works correctly and triggers CSV export.

instructions.details: Open processor portal in browser. Click 'Export CSV' button. Verify button click triggers exportSalesToCSV() function. Check for JavaScript errors in console.

tasks.name: Verify CSV generation works
tasks.description: Verify CSV file is generated correctly with all required data fields.

instructions.details: Test CSV export. Verify CSV file downloads. Open CSV file and verify it contains: sales data, customer information, plan details, field mappings work correctly, all 160+ fields included if using export-service.js.

acceptance_criteria: CSV format is valid (can open in Excel)

tasks.name: Verify export includes appliances data
tasks.description: Verify processor portal export includes appliances data (not just sales).

instructions.details: Test export with sales that have appliances. Verify exported CSV includes appliance data. Check that export-service.js handles appliances relationship data correctly. Verify appliances are included in CSV columns.

tasks.name: Verify all assets deployed to production
tasks.description: Verify all assets in src/ directory are deployed to Vercel production.

instructions.details: Deploy to Vercel production. Verify all assets accessible: favicon.ico, favicon.svg, all CSS files, all JavaScript files, all images. Check for 404 errors. Verify Vercel deployment includes all files from src/ directory.
